sp_widget.description: Documentation widget for Foundation Health Analyzer
sp_widget.name: FHA Documentation
sp_widget.template:
${FHA Documentation}

${Technical guide for the FHA documentation widget} | ${Version} {{c.data.appVersion}}

${Page ID}: {{c.data.pageId}} ${Widget ID}: {{c.data.widgetId}} ${Scope}: x_1310794_founda_0 ${Last updated}: {{c.data.lastUpdated}}
${Table of Contents}

${Description}

${This Service Portal widget provides interactive, in-portal documentation for the Foundation Health Analyzer application. It ships as the FHA Documentation page and is consumed directly within the portal.}

${Quick summary}

  • ${Role}: ${Explain FHA behavior, options, and APIs.}
  • ${Type}: ${Service Portal widget (AngularJS) with internal navigation and anchored sections.}
  • ${Audience}: ${ServiceNow admins, developers, governance teams.}

${Use cases}

${Run an analysis}

  • ${Understand configuration options}
  • ${Identify executed checks per module}

${Interpret a score}

  • ${Overall score and severities}
  • ${Prioritize remediations}

${Integrate FHA}

  • ${Use the REST API}
  • ${Automate analyses}

${Installation and access}

${This widget ships with the FHA app and requires no npm/pip installation.}

${Quick access}

/fha?id=fha_documentation

${Prerequisites and roles}

  • x_1310794_founda_0.admin ${or} x_1310794_founda_0.user
  • ${Service Portal enabled on the instance}

${Dependencies and versions}

${Component} ${Version} ${Notes}
ServiceNow Service Portal glide.buildname ${Provided by the instance (check system property).}
AngularJS (embarque) glide.buildname ${Provided by ServiceNow with the portal.}
Font Awesome (embarque) glide.buildname ${Uses icons through} fa ${classes.}
${Note}: ${Exact version depends on the instance. Check glide.buildname and glide.builddate to document target compatibility.}

${Configuration}

${The widget does not consume instance parameters. The documentation is rendered statically from the template and server data.}

${Widget parameters}

${Name} ${Type} ${Required} ${Default} ${Description}
widget_parameters Object ${No} {} ${No parameters expected.}

${Data exposed to the template}

${Name} ${Type} ${Example} ${Description}
data.appVersionString1.1.0${Application version}
data.lastUpdatedString2026-01-14${Documentation last updated date}
data.pageIdString{{c.data.pageId}}${Service Portal page ID}
data.widgetIdString{{c.data.widgetId}}${Service Portal widget ID}

${Public methods (client)}

${Method} ${Signature} ${Description}
setSectionsetSection(sectionId)${Update active section.}
scrollToSectionscrollToSection(sectionId)${Smooth scroll to anchor.}
goToDashboardgoToDashboard()${Back to} /fha?id=fha_homepage.

${Minimal example}

https://<instance>.service-now.com/fha?id=fha_documentation

${Useful system properties}

${Property} ${Default} ${Description}
x_1310794_founda_0.debugfalse${Enables FHA server-side debug logging.}

${Analysis options}

${These options are configuration fields on} x_1310794_founda_0_fha_configuration.

${Option} ${Type} ${Default} ${Effect}
deep_scanBooleanfalse${Script content analysis}
include_children_tablesBooleanfalse${Include child tables}
analyze_referencesBooleanfalse${Deep reference analysis}
include_ldapBooleanfalse${Full LDAP analysis}

Deep Scan

${Detects script quality issues.}

${Detects:}
  • current.update() ${inside Business Rules}
  • eval() ${and hardcoded sys_id}
  • ${GlideRecord without} setLimit()

${Child tables}

${Includes tables extending the analyzed table.}

${Example}: task -> incident, problem, change_request

${Reference analysis}

${Checks orphan references and integration dependencies.}

${LDAP analysis}

${Recommended for} sys_user, sys_user_group, core_company.

${Good to know}: ${Options affect processing time and the number of reported issues.}

${Health Score}

${Health score is calculated out of 100 based on detected issues.}

${Calculation}

score = 100
for each issue:
  if severity == 'high':   score -= 15
  if severity == 'medium': score -= 5
  if severity == 'low':    score -= 2

return max(0, score)

${Interpretation}

${Range} ${Status} ${Guidance}
70 - 100 ${Good} ${Monitor and address minor items.}
40 - 69 ${Needs attention} ${Plan medium/high remediations.}
0 - 39 ${Critical} ${Immediate action on high issues.}

${Analysis Checks}

${Checks are grouped by module. Each check returns a code, severity, and metadata.}

FHCheckTable

  • ${Table structure, custom fields, references}
  • ${Business Rules and Client Scripts}

FHCheckAutomation

  • ${Scheduled Jobs, Flows, Workflows, Notifications}
  • ${UI Actions and UI Policies}

FHCheckIntegration

  • ${Data Sources, Transform Maps, ACLs, REST APIs}
  • ${Import Sets and dependencies}

${Issue examples}

${Code} ${Severity} ${Description}
UNUSED_FIELDHIGH${Custom field never populated}
MANY_FLOWSMEDIUM${Too many flows on the table}
NO_READ_ACLMEDIUM${No read ACL defined}
CONSOLE_LOGLOW${console.log detected in a script}

${Technical architecture}

${Diagram (HTML)}

Service Portal (UI Layer)
FHA Dashboard Widget
FHA Analysis Results Widget
FHA Documentation Widget
FHAnalyzer
getAvailableAnalyses() runAnalysis(configSysId) getAnalysisResult(sysId)
FHAnalysisEngine
${Orchestrates execution via FHCheckRegistry}
FHCheckTable
  • Fields & Fill Rates
  • Business Rules
  • Client Scripts
  • Deep Scan
FHCheckAutomation
  • Scheduled Jobs
  • Flows
  • Workflows
  • Notifications
FHCheckIntegration
  • Data Sources
  • Transform Maps
  • ACLs
  • REST APIs
FHAnalysisContext
${Stores issues, metrics, options}
addIssue(code, message, severity, metadata)

${Mermaid diagram (if supported)}

graph TD
  A[Service Portal] --> B[Widgets FHA]
  B --> C[FHAnalyzer]
  C --> D[FHAnalysisEngine]
  D --> E[FHCheckRegistry]
  E --> F[FHCheckTable]
  E --> G[FHCheckAutomation]
  E --> H[FHCheckIntegration]
  D --> I[FHAnalysisContext]

${Data model}

${Table} ${Purpose} ${Key fields}
x_1310794_founda_0_fha_configuration ${Analysis configurations} name, table_reference, deep_scan, include_children_tables, analyze_references
x_1310794_founda_0_fha_results ${Analysis results} number, table_name, health_score, issue_found, detail_json, status

${REST API}

${FHA exposes a REST API for automation.}

${Base URL}

https://<instance>.service-now.com/api/x_1310794_founda_0/fha

${Endpoints}

${Method} ${Endpoint} ${Description}
GET/tables${List configurations}
POST/analyze/{table_name}${Run analysis by table}
POST/analyze_by_config/{config_sys_id}${Run analysis by configuration}
GET/analysis/{sys_id}${Get analysis result}
GET/statistics${Global statistics}
GET/history${Analysis history}
GET/fields?table_name={name}${Fields and fill rate}
POST/report/word${Generate report}

${Example: run an analysis}

POST /api/x_1310794_founda_0/fha/analyze/incident
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Basic <credentials>

{
  "deep_scan": true
}

${Best practices and warnings}

  • ${Performance}: ${Enable} deep_scan ${only when needed.}
  • ${Security}: ${Restrict access to FHA roles.}
  • ${Quality}: ${Prioritize HIGH and MEDIUM issues.}
  • ${Debug}: ${Enable} x_1310794_founda_0.debug ${for investigations.}
  • ${Internationalization}: ${Labels use the syntax} ${...}.
${Warning}: ${The widget does not validate API rights; ACLs and REST roles must be configured on the platform.}

${Additional resources}

  • ${Widget source}: sp_widget_5ada939c8392f21083e1b4a6feaad360.xml
  • ${Service Portal page}: sp_page_277a975c8392f21083e1b4a6feaad318.xml
  • ${Script Includes}: FHAnalyzer, FHAnalysisEngine, FHCheck*
  • ${API}: sys_ws_operation_* ${in the update folder}

${Changelog}

${Version} ${Date} ${Notes}
1.1.02026-01-04${Added advanced options (deep scan, child tables, references)}
1.1.0-doc2026-01-14${Documentation and structure update.}
1.0.02026-01-03${Initial version}

${Foundation Health Analyzer} v{{c.data.appVersion}} | ${Last updated}: {{c.data.lastUpdated}}

${Built with} ❤️ ${for ServiceNow}

sys_update_version.payload: custom c .fha-doc-container { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 20px; font-family: 'Segoe UI', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif; } .fha-doc-header { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1a5a96 0%, #2980b9 100%); color: white; padding: 40px; border-radius: 12px; margin-bottom: 30px; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(26, 90, 150, 0.3); } .fha-doc-header h1 { margin: 0 0 10px 0; font-size: 32px; font-weight: 600; } .fha-doc-header p { margin: 0; opacity: 0.9; font-size: 16px; } .fha-doc-nav { background: white; border-radius: 12px; padding: 20px; margin-bottom: 30px; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.08); position: sticky; top: 10px; z-index: 100; } .fha-doc-nav-title { font-size: 14px; font-weight: 600; color: #666; margin-bottom: 15px; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.5px; } .fha-doc-nav-items { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 10px; } .fha-doc-nav-btn { padding: 8px 16px; border: none; background: #f5f7fa; color: #333; border-radius: 20px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 14px; transition: all 0.2s; } .fha-doc-nav-btn:hover { background: #e8f4fc; color: #1a5a96; } .fha-doc-nav-btn.active { background: #1a5a96; color: white; } .fha-doc-section { background: white; border-radius: 12px; padding: 30px; margin-bottom: 25px; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.08); } .fha-doc-section h2 { color: #1a5a96; font-size: 24px; margin: 0 0 20px 0; padding-bottom: 15px; border-bottom: 2px solid #e8f4fc; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; } .fha-doc-section h2 i { font-size: 20px; } .fha-doc-section h3 { color: #333; font-size: 18px; margin: 25px 0 15px 0; } .fha-doc-section p { color: #555; line-height: 1.7; margin-bottom: 15px; } .fha-doc-table { width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; margin: 20px 0; font-size: 14px; } .fha-doc-table th { background: #f5f7fa; padding: 12px 15px; text-align: left; font-weight: 600; color: #333; border-bottom: 2px solid #e0e0e0; } .fha-doc-table td { padding: 12px 15px; border-bottom: 1px solid #eee; vertical-align: top; } .fha-doc-table tr:hover { background: #f9fbfd; } .fha-severity-badge { display: inline-block; padding: 4px 10px; border-radius: 12px; font-size: 12px; font-weight: 600; } .fha-severity-high { background: #fee2e2; color: #dc2626; } .fha-severity-medium { background: #fef3c7; color: #d97706; } .fha-severity-low { background: #dbeafe; color: #2563eb; } .fha-score-indicator { display: inline-flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; padding: 8px 15px; border-radius: 8px; font-weight: 600; } .fha-score-good { background: #d1fae5; color: #059669; } .fha-score-warning { background: #fef3c7; color: #d97706; } .fha-score-critical { background: #fee2e2; color: #dc2626; } .fha-code-block { background: #1e293b; color: #e2e8f0; padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; font-family: 'Monaco', 'Menlo', monospace; font-size: 13px; overflow-x: auto; margin: 15px 0; } .fha-code-inline { background: #f1f5f9; color: #0f172a; padding: 2px 8px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Monaco', 'Menlo', monospace; font-size: 13px; } .fha-info-box { background: #e8f4fc; border-left: 4px solid #1a5a96; padding: 15px 20px; border-radius: 0 8px 8px 0; margin: 20px 0; } .fha-info-box.warning { background: #fef3c7; border-left-color: #d97706; } .fha-info-box.success { background: #d1fae5; border-left-color: #059669; } /* Architecture Visual Diagram */ .fha-arch-visual { background: #f8fafc; border: 1px solid #e2e8f0; border-radius: 12px; padding: 30px; } .fha-arch-layer { background: white; border: 2px solid #e2e8f0; border-radius: 10px; padding: 20px; text-align: center; } .fha-arch-layer-title { font-weight: 700; font-size: 16px; color: #1a5a96; margin-bottom: 10px; } .fha-arch-ui { border-color: #60a5fa; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #eff6ff 0%, #dbeafe 100%); } .fha-arch-entry { border-color: #34d399; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ecfdf5 0%, #d1fae5 100%); } .fha-arch-engine { border-color: #fbbf24; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fffbeb 0%, #fef3c7 100%); } .fha-arch-context { border-color: #a78bfa; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f5f3ff 0%, #ede9fe 100%); } .fha-arch-boxes { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 15px; flex-wrap: wrap; margin-top: 10px; } .fha-arch-box { background: white; border: 1px solid #93c5fd; border-radius: 6px; padding: 10px 15px; font-size: 13px; font-weight: 500; color: #1e40af; } .fha-arch-methods { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 10px; flex-wrap: wrap; margin-top: 10px; } .fha-arch-methods code { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.05); padding: 4px 10px; border-radius: 4px; font-size: 12px; color: #374151; } .fha-arch-desc { font-size: 13px; color: #6b7280; } .fha-arch-arrow { text-align: center; padding: 10px 0; color: #9ca3af; font-size: 20px; } .fha-arch-checks { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr)); gap: 15px; } .fha-arch-check { background: white; border: 2px solid #e2e8f0; border-radius: 10px; padding: 15px; } .fha-arch-check-title { font-weight: 600; font-size: 14px; color: #1a5a96; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-bottom: 8px; border-bottom: 1px solid #e5e7eb; } .fha-arch-check-title i { margin-right: 6px; } .fha-arch-check ul { margin: 0; padding-left: 18px; font-size: 12px; color: #4b5563; } .fha-arch-check li { margin-bottom: 4px; } .fha-option-card { background: #f8fafc; border: 1px solid #e2e8f0; border-radius: 8px; padding: 20px; margin: 15px 0; } .fha-option-card h4 { color: #1a5a96; margin: 0 0 10px 0; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; } .fha-option-card p { margin: 0; color: #666; font-size: 14px; } .fha-feature-grid { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr)); gap: 20px; margin: 20px 0; } .fha-feature-card { background: #f8fafc; border-radius: 8px; padding: 20px; border: 1px solid #e2e8f0; } .fha-feature-card h4 { color: #1a5a96; margin: 0 0 10px 0; font-size: 16px; } .fha-feature-card ul { margin: 0; padding-left: 20px; color: #555; font-size: 14px; } .fha-feature-card li { margin-bottom: 5px; } .fha-doc-subtitle { font-size: 15px; opacity: 0.95; } .fha-doc-meta { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 10px; margin-top: 15px; font-size: 12px; } .fha-doc-meta-item { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15); padding: 6px 10px; border-radius: 999px; font-weight: 600; } .fha-doc-actions { margin-top: 18px; } .fha-doc-action-btn { display: inline-flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; padding: 10px 16px; border: none; border-radius: 8px; background: #ffffff; color: #1a5a96; font-weight: 600; cursor: pointer; box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.12); } .fha-doc-action-btn:hover { background: #e8f4fc; } .fha-doc-list { margin: 10px 0 0 0; padding-left: 18px; } .fha-doc-divider { height: 1px; background: #e8f4fc;
